morphInfos.tenseExplained: it happened‚ probably in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (similar to Active)
morphInfos.caseExplained: something is being done for them or relating to them
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.caseDescription: that something is done for‚ or in relation to
morphInfos.description: give them to nations that _have done_
morphInfos.explanation: an action that was happening – done by neuter people or things that something is done for‚ or in relation to
